About.title: Software developer
About.name: Einar Logi
About.paragraph1: I'm a software developer, designer, and tech enthusiast based in Iceland. I love building things - whether it's web apps, cool designs, or tiny shrimp ecosystems in my aquarium (seriously, I have way too many).
About.paragraph2: In my free time I'm probably out running, painting my Blood Angels army for Warhammer 40k, or figuring out how to make my website just a little bit cooler.
About.paragraph3: Right now, I'm working on JITR, a revolutionary staffing platform. If you need a great website or just want to talk tech, feel free to reach out!

Contact.name: Einar Logi
Contact.title: Contact Me
Contact.titleText: Whether you're looking for a web developer, need help with a tech project, or just want to chat about design, gaming, or creative ideas, feel free to drop me a message!
